content: **may 2011** moonmama s square a day in may crochet along is now underway just pop over to the ravelry group 1 take a peek i think you ll find it hard to resist joining in thank you melissa for choosing my multi colour flower square as your #13 i can t wait to see all the finished squares 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/a-square-a-day-in-may
